mapper.select: SELECT STDNT.STDNT_SN AS "stdntSn", STDNT.STDNT_NM AS "stdntNm", STDNT.STDNT_TELNO AS "stdntTelNo", STDNT.STDNT_EML_ADDR AS "stdntEmlAddr", STDNT.STDNT_BRDT AS "stdntBrdt", STDNT.STDNT_ADDR AS "stdntAddr", STDNT.STDNT_GRD AS "stdntGrd", STDNT.SCSBJT_CD AS "scsbjtCd", STDNT.USER_NO AS "userNo", STDNT.ACAVSR_NO AS "acavsrNo", TNG_STDNT.TTRHR AS "stdntHr", TNG_STDNT.INDST_EVL_YN AS "idnstEvlYn" FROM STDNT LEFT JOIN TNG_STDNT ON STDNT.STDNT_SN = TNG_STDNT.STDNT_SN WHERE TNG_NO = #{tngNo} AND TNG_PRGRS_STTS = '30'
